resources.string: Lista de comandos ao selecionar o tabuleiro
Digite no formulário de entrada de comandos.
Ir ao formulário de entrada de comandos e jogadas.
Anunciar peça tomada na última jogada.
Anunciar possíveis jogadas da peça selecionada.
Anunciar possíveis capturas com a peça selecionada.
Mover à casa adjacente à esquerda, direita, para cima ou para baixo.
Mova para uma peça digitando seu tipo. Use maiúscula para inverter a ordem.
Mova da fila a para a h.

string.name: announcePieceLocations
string.comment:
This is an instruction for how blind users can use the command form.
Here, they can type in "p N", "p k", or "p A" for the respective commands. Capital letters are for white pieces while lowercase letters are for black pieces.
Please write out "capital" or "lowercase" to distinguish it for blind users.

resources.string: Anunciar a localização das peças. Exemplo: p N maiúsculo para os cavalos brancos, p k minúsculo para o rei preto, p A maiúsculo para todas as peças brancas.

string.name: announcePiecesOnRankOrFile
string.comment:
This is an instruction for how blind users can use the command form.
Here, they must type in "s" to announce pieces on the rank or file. So "s a" would announce all pieces on file a, while "s 1" would announce all pieces on file 1.
Please keep the space. Screen readers may not read the text out correctly without a space present.

resources.string: Anunciar peças em uma fileira ou coluna. Exemplo: s a, s 1.

string.name: goToBoard
string.comment: Please keep the hyphen in or use a space for moves (e.g. "a 1"). Screen readers may not read the text out correctly without a hyphen or space present.

resources.string: Ir ao tabuleiro. A casa padrão é e4. Você pode especificar uma casa: board a-1 ou b a-1 te levará à casa a1.
Para mover uma peça, use a notação algébrica padrão.

string.name: promotion
string.comment: This is meant to be read verbally by a screen reader. Please do NOT use the symbol "=" when translating "equals". Write it as a full word.

resources.string: Para não promover para uma dama, use \"equals\". Por exemplo, a-8-equals-n promove para um cavalo.

string.name: sanSymbols
string.comment: Keep this order: king queen rook bishop knight takes

resources.string: R D T B C x

string.name: sanTakes
string.comment:
Indicates a piece captured another piece as part of a longer sentence. Examples: "knight takes f 3" "e takes f 3" The exact format can vary depending on the user's preferences. See the screenshot for the options as of 2025-08-23.
Used only in blind mode when the screen reader verbally announces a move.
'Takes' corresponds to "x" in Standard Algebraic Notation, for pieces being captured.

string.name: sanPromotesTo
string.comment:
Indicates a piece is promoted, as part of a longer sentence. Examples: "e promotes to queen"
Used only in blind mode when the screen reader verbally announces a move.
'Takes' corresponds to "=" in Standard Algebraic Notation, for pieces being promoted.

string.name: sanShortCastling
string.comment: O-O in standard notation; also known as kingside castling

string.name: sanLongCastling
string.comment: O-O-O in standard notation; also known as queenside castling.

string.name: sanDroppedOn
string.comment:
Indicates a piece is dropped on a square in the Crazyhouse variant, as part of a longer sentence.
In Crazyhouse, any pieces you capture are placed in your pocket. You can then drop those pieces onto any square on the board.
Examples: "bishop is dropped on c 4 check" (B@c4+) "pawn is dropped on f 7" (@f7)
Used only in blind mode when the screen reader verbally announces a move.
'dropped on' corresponds to "@" in Crazyhouse's form of algebraic notation.

resources.string: Pré-movimento gravado: %s. Pressione enter para cancelar

string.name: pockets
string.comment: Pockets in Crazyhouse, which hold captured pieces and let players place them again

resources.string: %s copiado para a área de transferência

string.name: pgnAndFen
string.comment: Will be a heading read out over text-to-speech for blind users looking to share a PGN or FEN of a game.
